member.name: T:SimPe.Plugin.Gmdc.AbstractGmdcImporter
member.summary: Implement this abstract class to create a new Gmdc Importer Plugin, however you can also base your new Importer on , which offers a more simple Interface, as you only have to implement the reading of the vertice, normals... Data
member.remarks:
SimPE offers diffrent Importer Abstraction classes. The most common one is AbstractGmdcImporter. It is used whenever you just want to import/overwrite Mesh Groups (vertext data...) but want to leave the rest of the Gmdc File alone.
However, if you want to create a complete new (or altered) gmdc File you need to implement the IGmdcReplacementImporter.

member.name: P:SimPe.Plugin.Gmdc.GmdcLink.AliasValues
member.summary:
This Array Contains three Items. Each Item has to be interporeted as Element Index Alias. The is referencing the Vertices that form a Face by an Index. If one of this Lists is set, it means, that whenever you pares an Index, read the value stored at that Index in one of this Lists. The Value read from there is then thge actual Index.
The first List store here is an Alias Map for the first referenced in the Property.

member.name: M:SimPe.Plugin.Gmdc.GmdcImporterBase.LoadLists
member.summary: Initializes the , , and Lists
member.remarks:
The (SimPe.Plugin.Gmdc.GmdcElementValueThreeFloat), (SimPe.Plugin.Gmdc.GmdcElementValueThreeFloat) and (SimPe.Plugin.Gmdc.GmdcElementValueTwoFloat) Lists contain the actual Coordinates for the vertices, normals and uvcoordinates.
The Hashtable (key=name of a Meshgroup, value = (SimPe.Plugin.Gmdc.GmdcElementValueThreeFloat) List) contains the Listing of all available faces in a Group.
The SimPe.Plugin.Gmdc.GmdcElementValueThreeFloat Members of the faces List enumerate the Vertex (data[0]), Normal (data[2]) and UVCoordinate (data[1]) Indices in the corresponding Lists.
